website_summaries.verdict: This highly rated sectional set is a wonderful pick for customers who want a stylish model with eccentric color options.
pros: Modular design allows for unique arrangements
Includes table with tempered glass top
Cushions are zippered and easy to clean
cons: Does not come with throw pillows
Fabric color tends to fade in sun

customer_reviews.title: I am trying to find a better product to replace them
customer_reviews.text: I have only had a couple months and the cushions are already bleached out from the sun.. I called the company and they are sending me brand new covers. I am really happy that I reached out to them..
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia B.

customer_reviews.title: I love the furniture and I was so happy about the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the furniture and I was so happy about the color being true to sight. Only one complaint...we have only had it for a short time and we haven't even hit the hot summer and I am already noticing some fading of the fabric. This is disappointing...so we have been covering it which is kind of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice; takes some time to assemble, but I'm pleased with the result.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT BUY.......
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Do set aside about 2 hours to put together on a tarp. Do purchase the fastners to keep couches together.(Doesn't come with it0. The pillows are made well and of a good quality outdoor fabric. I would like to point out that Pier One has a very smaller version of this in blue, same materials for twice the amount of money. Also Costco has something close to this. Made out of same materials, asking again, twice as much. I am very pleased. It takes a month to receive, BUT well worth the wait. Coffee table is nice and ready to have cocktails around.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine J Garber

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER THIS SET!!!!! TOO SMALL FOR ADULTS, THIN PILLOWS AND UNCOMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I ORDERED THIS SET AND COULDN'T BELIEVE WHAT I GOT. THIS SET LOOKS LIKE SOMETHING FOR KIDS NOT ADULTS. I PUT THE SET TOGETHER AND REALIZED THAT THIS CAN'T BE STANDARD SIZE FURNITURE. THERE'S NO SUPPORT FOR YOUR BACK. VERY DISAPPOINTED. I WAITED A COUPLE OF WEEKS BEFORE I CONTACTED THE SELLER JUST TO GIVE IT A TRY BUT I JUST COULDN'T CHANGE MY MIND. AFTER CONTACTING THE SELLER I ALSO LEARNED THAT YOU CAN'T RETURN THE SET WITHOUT THE ORIGINAL BOXES. NOW I'M STUCK WITH THIS JUNK. THIS WAS A $795 MISTAKE!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: The patio furniture was of good quality and looked as appeared on the website. We returned to Modenzi because it looked like children's furniture. The backs are only approximately 25 inches high and my husband is 6'2" tall. The cushions are very comfortable and well made. Had the furniture been higher(at least reugular height) we would have kept it. Modenzi was very courteous and prompt with our refund. We will purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about buying this online without seeing it but I’m glad I did. The price is great and it looks great. I was worried about the height but it is not bad at all, more of a lounging set. Takes about 2 hours to set up with a drill. The glass fits fine on ours. BUY THE CLIPS IF YOU WANT THE MIDDLE PIECES TO STAY TOGETHER. I bought the 10 piece middle size. Overall very happy would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Create your own island oasis!
customer_reviews.text: We bought several pieces to add together and make a huge sectional. Everyone is floored when we tell them how inexpensive it was as it looks like other ones that cost close to double the price! We were very happy with the support we received from the seller and are so happy we found these!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I had done a lot of research and comparison before purchasing this sectional. I'm very happy with my decision, and the set looks great! It took a while to set up - a few hours, and the shipping took a while - a few weeks. Otherwise it is a bargain for the size and look of it. Others I compared it to were in the $2k range. It is a bit light, so I purchased Velcro stickers for the cushions and the chair clips to hold them in place. It is vey comfortable, and I'm lounging while reading in it as I write!
customer_reviews.author: bsams

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but the back is low and the cushions are ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but the back is low and the cushions are hard. Not as comfortable as I would have liked. It was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest and chepest and high qualitiest product I have ever ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest and chepest and high qualitiest product I have ever seen. Also this company has the great customer services. They are very supportive after the purchase and they are great and polite team. I highly recomend to buy this product. You will never be regreat
customer_reviews.author: Elin

customer_reviews.title: other than that great set for the
customer_reviews.text: The original cushions faded from the sun, spoke with the company and they are correcting The situation with new cushion covers. ....do not suggest a bright color if going to be in sun all day. ..other than that great set for the price
customer_reviews.author: Michael Borgmann

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This sectional is huge. I love it! It took me approximately three hours to put it together by myself with only one piece needing to be taken apart and redone because I did it backwards. All the cushion covers zip off which is perfect for those of us with pets.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: I love the sectional however I don't love the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought last year Sept. I love the sectional however I don't love the fact that the cushions were NOT waterproofed. My cushions look horrible and I've not even had this set a year. Super disappointed about the cushions. Also trying to find replacements so far isn't an option. I've looked around and I might as well buy a new furniture set since replacement cushions cost so much. I would think a purchase this substantial should have waterproof cushions at least.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Little

customer_reviews.title: Product is good but takes a while to assemble it
customer_reviews.text: Product is good but takes a while to assemble it,must balance it too. It is both durable and looks good. Only pieces are too light and move away from each other easily. So need to tie them together with special clips that you can order for about $4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Major fail
customer_reviews.text: The cushions look nothing like the pic.. Thin and not as pretty as the material looks in the pic.
customer_reviews.author: madi

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Patio furniture arrived unharmed and before delivery date. A bit time consuming putting it together but it was worth it Lots of pillows, not super comfortable but it is for patio not for watching t.v...Thank you Modenzi.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria T.

customer_reviews.title: Cushions faded immediately
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. The cushions on this faded within a few months and we have it under a covered patio. So now the cushions are dark In some spots and light in others and looks terrible. The fabric should be UV protected. I contacted the sellers and they offered nothing but advise that I should have sprayed the cushions prior. In addition the cushions are thin and hard and like others stated very low. I’m supper upset since I expected this to last a few years at least and cushion replacement is very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo M

customer_reviews.title: The furniture itself is great but the cushions fade very fast
customer_reviews.text: The furniture itself is great but the cushions fade very fast. We have a covered back porch that gets little sun and the teal set has faded to half the color it originally was.
customer_reviews.author: CWooley

customer_reviews.title: The furniture is good quality for the money and the fabric quality and ...
customer_reviews.text: This purchase came sooner than they promised. The furniture is good quality for the money and the fabric quality and color is beautiful. I've been holding off and researching for good quality patio furniture for months and I'm glad I held off. The only downfall is putting it together. All the holes lined up so that was the easy part. The harder part was using the Allen wrench included. Get the size you need and attach to a drill and it will make your life a whole life easier.
customer_reviews.author: vcuriel

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but chairs are short and very light. Didn't receive all the washers in the package but after contacting 3 times they finally came through and threw in some throw pillows which are about the size of the pillows you would use on an airline.dont look like they will be useful unless you stack 3 of them together. Would not recommend buying throw pillows. They No longer offer the single glass pane table. It comes in 4 separate pieces which loses some appeal. Liquid spills are able to get down into the wicker on the table.
customer_reviews.author: O Echev

customer_reviews.title: Faded after one season.
customer_reviews.text: Faded after one season outdoors under a covered patio. How can this possibly fade this quickly. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If only the back were higher it would make for more comfortable seating.
customer_reviews.text: It's as advertised. If only the back were higher it would make for more comfortable seating.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F.

customer_reviews.title: I loved the price
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price, the color is true (I bought teal), I love the size, BUT... it's uncomfortable. I will buy more comfortable cushions later on. I love the depth of the seating, but the back is very low. I'm 5'2" and it hits my mid back. Just something to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Great new space
customer_reviews.text: I was a huge reader of the reviews before I ordered, they seemed very mixed, but I took the chance and ordered anyways. Assembly was super easy and very straight forward. Tip legs do not need the washer, just screw in. Assembly WILL take 2 hrs. Shipping was just what they said, color was very pretty, we ordered real. It's very sturdy, cushions are firm, but it's actually very comfortable. As far as material fading, we should not have a issue as deck is covered. Material is so far good. It does not look cheap, but it is NOT real wicker either, but were good with that, wicker dries and gets very brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: A lot to put together. Color on the fabric ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot to put together. Color on the fabric was a little off from some of the other pieces. Had a problem with one chair and another was sent right away to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda P.

customer_reviews.title: Connie Lyons
customer_reviews.text: Love my furniture it's not the color shown it's more blue but it still very nice and was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Read about assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the price looks good. As far as assembly open 1 box at a time. Get a drill with a Allen wrench head to match and put it on a very low torque setting. Treat it like an assembly line. I got 1 box done (usually 2 chairs) in about 25 minutes. For side panels always put middle center screw in first to keep it level for the side screws. Use the box as a table to assemble pieces and assemble most of it with the pieces upside down. There are not enough washers for foot pieces (where they are definitely needed) if you use high torque screw head goes through plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cushions fade quickly
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this in January & 6 months later, the cushions are super faded & look shabby. We’re super disappointed with the quality. When we fist got them, they were bright blue, now they are very light blue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: absolutely happy with this!!
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I pictured for our screened in patio! We LOVE the color and we had been looking at something to buy that was similar to the outdoor furniture that we see at the Sandals resorts and it's very similar. It took a couple hours to assemble 2 chairs and the coffee table (one person) and then it was a breeze to finish the rest once there was 2 people assembling. This was half the price of the one we were originally going to buy (for the same exact furniture) and I really couldn't be happier with this. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: They slip, I wish it came with connectors to hold them together. And I was missing a bunch of washers.
customer_reviews.author: SabSab

customer_reviews.title: 2 1/2 stars for a 6 foot and up not good. You would need more back support for us ...
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the price. 2 1/2 stars for a 6 foot and up not good. You would need more back support for us tall people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water Logged 70% of the Time
customer_reviews.text: This is allegedly OUTDOOR furniture. Well, it rains outdoors and every single time it rains, this furniture gets waterlogged. Worse, you have to stand the pillows up on end to get them to dry. So it is anything but easy. It rains. The pillows all get sogged. We stand them up, looking terrible for a few days to dry out. It rains and the cycle repeats. Also, if there's a big wind, they get sprayed over the yard. Terrible purchase and deeply regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Hebron

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last long doesn’t come with stainless screws.
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, isn’t as big as the pictures makes it look and the coffee table is half the size, easy to put together but doesn’t come with locking washers so it’ll become wiggly over time. I feel it’s way over priced once I received it..
customer_reviews.author: Cleve Grable

customer_reviews.title: These were on super sale. They are extremely versatile
customer_reviews.text: These were on super sale. They are extremely versatile, as you can arrange them in a variety of combinations. They quality of the pillows are good. The quality of the plastic is ok. No major flaws and they have not weathered outside YET. We've had them 6 months in the Midwest. They do sit somewhat low to the ground. For the price the quality is what I expected. I would recommend these for an outdoor patio or sitting area. They also stack nicely so when taking in for the winter can be stored fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Cushions fade. Good quality furniture though.
customer_reviews.text: The furniture is very nice. Cushions fade terribly- and I live in ND where it’s not that sunny. Second covers did same thing.
customer_reviews.author: k8tk8

customer_reviews.title: it's a beautiful set, took some time to put together
customer_reviews.text: I'll agree with most of the reviews, it's a beautiful set, took some time to put together, cushions are a bit thin and it is a bit short to the ground, but for the price, can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great looking set
customer_reviews.text: This set looks great, but the back is pretty low and if you are really tall it may not work for you. The cushions are not super thick so I'll be curious to see how they hold up over time, but after using this set for 3 months or so we are loving it and enjoy our back patio much more than we used to.
customer_reviews.author: Taco Jesus Hot Sauce

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to our backyard
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this. The angle of the picture does make it look bigger but we measured to be sure so that was fine. The back height is fine. I was a little worried cause of other comments but I guess if you’re 7 ft it may be an issue but it wasn’t for our guests. Color is just as pictured and the cushion is nicely firm but comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: FADE FAST
customer_reviews.text: Although we like the couch, the cushions faded from red to pink in less than one season. I have contacted the seller and they didn't offer any help, told me to check their site... which had no cushions on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom5

customer_reviews.title: takes time to assemble and screws are pretty tight cornered so requires patience and maybe second hand ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast, takes time to assemble and screws are pretty tight cornered so requires patience and maybe second hand to hold at times. Sofa looks awesome and exactly as shown in pictures. Was skeptical during ordering since Modenzi either sells on Amazon or EBay and does not web site. But very pleased with the purchase. I ordered orange color cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Moneyfool

customer_reviews.title: The backs are a bit lower than I thought but are fine. The wicker matches many other products on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Took us a bit of time to put together but it was simple to do. No way it could be put together wrong as long as you follow directions. We needed hooks that are sold separately so the pieces didn't slid on the deck. The backs are a bit lower than I thought but are fine. The wicker matches many other products on the market. So it looks like I bought everything at the same place.
customer_reviews.author: Denise MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: I know it can be scary to buy furniture online (I have had bad experiences in the past) however I am happy to write this review. This is a great set for the price! Well made, thick cushions, looks expensive. It arrived well packaged and took like an hour to get it all put together. I recommend this set!!
customer_reviews.author: WAM

customer_reviews.title: ... little time consuming to put together but it looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The furniture was a little time consuming to put together but it looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor patio furniture choice!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice for our patio furniture. We absolutely love it! (Plastic resin wicker, NOT wood wicker that would have cracked, or peeled.) Comfortable, and an easy assembly with very well organized parts/instructions. Very comfortable and lightweight. Easily arranged in any type of configuration, which is a plus. Best choice out there for patio furniture, in our opinion. Our guest love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mtntrek2

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews, but thought this product and seller deserve some feedback. The outdoor furniture arrived very quickly for a cross country shipment. Everything was packaged very well, especially the glass for the table. The entire set was extremely easy to assemble using my 1/4" impact. The furniture is very comfortable and has high quality outdoor cushions. I couldn't recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: JKC

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with buying a 7 piece outdoor furniture set is that you have to assemble 7 pieces. They did short me a few washers but it went together well and is very good looking and comfortable. We went to Home Depot and bought some covers that fit well because you really should cover the furniture at night.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: If it was half the price it would't be worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We were worried about ordering this type of product online but when we got it and assembled it, we were not worried anymore. It is easy to put together. I am 6 ft tall and weigh 285 and it is comfortable enough even for me. Great product and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: tee

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and the first time I brought red. It faded after a few weeks. I contacted them and after much hesitation they replaced the covers only with a beige color. I took the covers off and washed them to keep them fresh and clean. The padding of the seats are poorly made and crumbled when taking the covers off and on. When you take the covers on and off (we did this at the end of Summer) And stored them inside The Cushions were flat. I do not recommend this product. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Melton

customer_reviews.title: Affordable set..not sure how it will hold up if we ever get rain .Clamps are included..
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this sectional and the versatility..one issue though is the fabric stains easily..and doesn't clean very well..the sprinkler hit it..water stains are very evident and not coming out.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, sturdy, comfy
customer_reviews.text: This patio furniture is fabulous! The wicker frame is sturdy and the padding and pillows are comfortable. The red is nice and bright. I am also very happy with the price, very affordable compared to other stores.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Q

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: These arrived earlier than expected in 5 moderate size boxes. Of course assembly is required. Do yourself a favor use a cordless drill with Allen screw tip. It took me average 10-15 mins assembly per chair but very easy. DO NOT TIGHTEN BOLTS UNTIL ALL BOLTS ARE INSTALLED. you can thank me later. All in all good set but from others pictures I thought it would be larger. Granted we have a very large back deck so set looks small. So far seems durable and very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M.

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, the only thing I do not like ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, the only thing I do not like are the four pieces of glass, not thick enough and has a small chip on two pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Od

customer_reviews.title: Cushions fade very fast and they are sponges
customer_reviews.text: This has been on our patio for only a few weeks and the cushions are already faded. See the picture. The darker color was the original color of the entire cushion and that part didn't fade because it was covered by the back cushion. I guess the cushion will be white by the end of the summer. We are in Jersey. Also the cushion insert is foam so when it rains the cushion absorbs all the water and after a couple of days of 90 degree heat, I picked up the cushion and water still came pouring out. The top surface was dry to sit on though. This is really ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Greg H.

customer_reviews.title: Faded very quickly and now looks terrible after just one month.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product knowing it was going to be a cheaper then the other options. You will pay for that in looks and quickly. The whole set faded within weeks of putting it up. We have an umbrella from a different company that is right next to the set and that looks fine, but the set looks terrible. There is nothing you can do, it's an outdoor set and it looks like crap. spend a little more and get something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed in the total package and it was not as ...
customer_reviews.text: Verrrry lightweight. Have to find a way to attach each seat to each other. Seat pads are very firm and uncomfortable. Extremely disappointed in the total package and it was not as simple to put together as they lead you to believe. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Heath

customer_reviews.title: Color Faded really fast
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the material this company uses fades really fast. For being outside furniture you would expect it to last more than one summer but as you can see by the photos our vibrate orange is now white after one summer. Very disappointing being I cover it most days that we don’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: kevin Aylesworth

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfortable, sturdy sofa. Cushions fade fast and badly.
customer_reviews.text: Came nicely packaged, easy to assemble (2 person job), comfortable. Disappointed in how quickly and how notably the cushions faded. Hoping to do somethinG this Spring to fix it. Not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Frank

customer_reviews.title: it looks great. Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it looks great. Easy set up. I would recommend having an electric screwdriver, makes job go by faster. I was sent one of the wrong cushion colors, and the company sent me the correct one right away, so easy to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our family members are all over 6' and makes us feel like we are sitting on midget furniture
customer_reviews.text: Very small and low to the ground. Our family members are all over 6' and makes us feel like we are sitting on midget furniture. Cushions stain easily!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Alot of assembly, rusty already, but overall very nice set. Wish they were connected all together. They slide when you sit and pillows move alot when you sit.
customer_reviews.author: Cristi M. Hennells

customer_reviews.title: Way bigger then i thought
customer_reviews.text: I have had this set for almost a year ..used it for my living room ...for winter then had it outside for this summer ...sun killed the color but didnt brake down .to replace the seat have to find where to get new replacement .
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: I still think it’s a very nice set. I just ordered additional chair today .
customer_reviews.text: Buy the additional clamps it holds the chairs together better than the clamps it comes with.Also it is a little low to the ground but nonetheless it’s functional.
customer_reviews.author: angel perry

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this outdoor furniture. It perfectly fits the space, looks exactly as it is shown online, comfortable and is a stunning color. It was a bit of a project to put together, definitely a 2 person job, and we didn't really mess with the multiple configurations though probably will when we entertain. The instructions were really clear and my son and I got it done in a couple of hours, now I just need a few throw pillows and we are done!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Goverman

customer_reviews.title: Very small child size like
customer_reviews.text: Extremely small furniture. Looks like its made for kids. Very flimsy not very sturdy at all. Came with several broken feet. Extremely disappointed for almost $800 i expected better quality, sturdy adult sized furniture!!!
customer_reviews.author: Not happy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, beautiful and sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: Not a dislike, however the cushions are not as gold as shown in the picture. If you plan to buy accessory pillows, wait until you see the actual color needed to match.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We like the furniture on the patio. We had guest over and the also like the patio furniture
customer_reviews.author: sully

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The product is very sturdy. We use it on a daily basis. The only grip is the cushions slide on the sofas. Easy fix. Pick up some rug non slip fabric. Cut to size. And for the back pillows you can attachment the rug non slip fabric to the upright of the sofas with velcro. Don't use the velcro on the cushions they will rip in time.
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: quantity of material is ok but won't recommend for tall people . no back support to lean on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and customer service. You get exactly what you see in the picture
customer_reviews.author: CMP

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Good value for the price. Wish the back was a little higher but has a great look.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bryan

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set in red and it looks great. The seat cushions are very very firm, but the back cushions are very thick and comfortable. We liked this set so much we ordered another for our front porch.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Z

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Assembly was easy, but they could have supplied more washers. some of the screws want to pull through the tubing as they are tightened. other than that assembly was a breeze. They sent the wrong color cushions, but quickly sent out replacements covers to make it right. Overall this product was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Luciano

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste ur money!! Awful!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap looking and def not worth the money!! Pieces lined up crooked due to some damaged bent pieces and didnt have all the holes predrilled so kind of a pain to put together
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set bright colors!
customer_reviews.text: We loved it! Very easy to assemble and very comfortable! Cushions are nicely made. Very pleased with this purchase 😊
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Summer comfort
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with purchase. No missing items in the order, and fairly easy to assemble. Lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Murray

customer_reviews.title: It us not difficult to put together. I just found it to be time consuming.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase. I have to say that I was a little concerned about the size after reading some of the previous reviews.Thankfully, when I was able to see it in person any doubts I had went away.My set came with the clios that hold the sectional together and they work perfectly!I feel it looks like one of the pricier sets without the high price tag.I can't wait to spend time enjoying this outdoor furniture!
customer_reviews.author: R. Croce

customer_reviews.title: Great quality great price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous set. As beautiful as the photo online. Cushions zip off for easy cleaning. Love the dark wicker color. Amazing low price. And delivered in a timely fashion. It is easy to assemble but it is a lot. 2 loveseat. 2 chairs and a coffe table.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Cozy comfy summer chill spot!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect set for our back porch! So happy with the sturdiness and yet how lightweight it is!
customer_reviews.author: MKBEEB

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: I love the set, one of the chairs were damage, but I didn't want to return it, didn't want to deal with that. The description says water proof, but its not.
customer_reviews.author: elamor21

customer_reviews.title: It’s an Ok product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, as I have a large deck. They looked good for a short time. But the cushions have sun faded at different rates. Some are much more faded than others (with uv scotchguard applied as well) and they hold water. I thought they would be more water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod M.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Fabric, Cushions Caved!
customer_reviews.text: It’s almost a year and the cushions caved. The fabric is horrible, not only it’s faded (all of it) even when my patio furniture is not even out in the open, it also looks like I had this for years which is of course nog the case! Now can’t even find cushion covers to save my face!
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, but that's about it. Poor quality, not sure if it will last more than a year. I'll give another review at that time. Cushions are cheap and very uncomfortable. Not uv protected. Color faded in less than a 2 months. Pretty disappointed. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Meggan Carey

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the red but started fading in the first 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews before I bought and had a little concern on comments about the backs being low. Once it arrived and we started using it I was pleasantly surprised at how much more comfortable it is to rest your arm on it while turned to talk to others. Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ondejko

customer_reviews.title: Be patient when assembling
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, price was great. Not easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Sharon

customer_reviews.title: great furniture poor assembly system
customer_reviews.text: Great furniture and design but poor assembly system, long and difficult to use power tool to speed up process
customer_reviews.author: juflr2

customer_reviews.title: Sectional
customer_reviews.text: I love this sectional. It looks so nice on my patio. I get lots of compliments. Very sturdy. Easy to assemble. I would gladly recommend this sectional to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christina blain

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful outdoor set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, comfortable, easy to assemble. Can't wait for the arm chair to come out in the same color.
customer_reviews.author: Katie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Fits perfectly on my deck
customer_reviews.text: Setup my set and I’m very happy with it! It’s comfortable and allows me to seat more people than my previous set. I purchased a water proof cover to keep over it when I’m not using it to prevent the combination of fading colors from the sun and rain damage.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred M. Bell Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not as seen on picture
customer_reviews.text: The image and the actual product has a world of difference in between
customer_reviews.author: MURAT NALCIOGLU

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Furniture is very small. I expected something bigger and sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Dominga Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Price is unbeatable but the cuchions are pretty hard
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. Made it through 2 years and still durable.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Haze

customer_reviews.title: Put together in less than two hours and very sturdy! Exactly what we needed for an outdoor area
customer_reviews.text: Put together in less than two hours and very sturdy! Exactly what we needed for an outdoor area. Instructions are easy to follow. Sofa and coffee table material is plastic and easy to scratch was our only concern.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa noble

customer_reviews.title: Furniture is well-built and my children love to sleep on it
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product because it fit in well with like colors at the pool and it also matches other furniture I have very comfortable and hopefully it lasts a long time my Furniture is well-built and my children love to sleep on it
customer_reviews.author: Joetta Moyers

customer_reviews.title: Color of cushions fading within a month
customer_reviews.text: The cushions are a gorgeous vibrant turquoise when they arrive, but after less than one month they are already faded. I need to know what I can do to remedy this situation. I paid almost $800 for this set and was not expecting the cushions to fade so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Chase

customer_reviews.title: cushions fade
customer_reviews.text: took 2 hours to assemble uncomfortable very low backs the cushions are already faded my $5 pillows from walmart are lasting longer. I will have to redo cushions soon and I have only had this product 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: wendylee goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but very uncomfortable. Doesn’t own up to comfort description on site. Back height of furniture too small
customer_reviews.author: Kwas

product_meta.title: Modenzi 7G-U Outdoor Sectional Patio Furniture Espresso Brown Wicker Sofa Set (Red)
product_meta.description:
Color:RedModenzi 7G Outdoor Set 


Create a beautiful outdoor seating area that you have always dreamed of with this 7pcs Patio Furniture Sofa Set from Modenzi Outdoor. Constructed from a lightweight aluminum frame and hand woven from the top quality PE espresso brown resin wicker fiber meticulously designed to provide you with the most comfortable and relaxing outdoor lounging experience.


Specifications: 
Corner Chair Dimensions: 31.5"L x 31.5"W x 24.5"H
Middle Chair Dimensions: 31.5"L x 27.5"W x 24.5"H
Coffee Table Dimensions: 31.5"L x 31.5"W x 13.4"H 
Seating Height with seat cushion is 17"
Material: Aluminum Frame & PE Rattan
Rattan Color: Espresso Brown
feature_bullets: 7pc Set consists of 2 Corner sofa + 4 Middle Sofas + 1 Coffee Table + 1 Tempered Glass Table Top. (Throw Pillows Not Included)
9 Cushion colors Available with 4" seats for comfortable seating with zippers for a quick and easy wash.
Espresso Brown Wicker PE Resin Wicker Sofa Set offers a modular design, that makes it possible for flexibility with numerous arrangement options.
Light enough to move around easily for different configurations. Choose between 9 different cushion colors.
Assembly Required and a 90 Days warranty on our framework. Durable powder coated Aluminum frames.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars333 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
